author: chucklu
body:
Hi，
   I am using powershell 6.1.0, I try to use get-eventlog and remove-eventlog today.
  And I find it was not supported in 6.0, but was supported in 5.0 .

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: These cmdlets will be resolved by https://github.com/powershell/windowspowershellcompatibilitypack

title: When will Get-EventLog and Remove-EventLog will be added to powershell 6.0?
